headline: Show HN: Simple Badges – Simple Icons on Your Favorite Shields.io Badges
description:
Around this time a year ago, I forked and built Simple Badges on top of the Simple Icons website. Existing projects on this often try to manually maintain a single, huge Markdown file containing pre-assembled Shields.io badges for people to pick. They usually require constant manual effort to follow upstream updates and may lack some icons as a result. Simple Badges automatically tracks upstream icon updates, provides a badge preview page that easy to navigate, and makes it easy to get all four styles of badges in Markdown or HTML img format.

If you happen to be refurbishing your profile - give Simple Badges a try! Suggestion and contribution are welcomed :-)

headline_zh-Hant: Show HN: 簡單的徽章--你最喜歡的Shield.io徽章上的簡單圖標
description_zh-Hans:
大约在一年前的这个时候，我在Simple Icons网站的基础上分叉并建立了Simple Badges。这方面现有的项目往往试图手动维护一个巨大的Markdown文件，其中包含预先组装好的Shields.io徽章供人们挑选。他们通常需要不断的手动努力来跟踪上游的更新，并可能因此而缺乏一些图标。Simple Badges自动跟踪上游图标的更新，提供了一个易于浏览的徽章预览页面，并使人们可以很容易地获得Markdown或HTML img格式的所有四种风格的徽章。

如果你碰巧正在整修你的个人资料--请试试Simple Badges吧 欢迎提出建议和贡献:-)
